alert.note: Alert for Daniels; Northern Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 5:42PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Daniels and northeastern Valley Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 541 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southeast of Peerless, or 14 miles southwest of Scobey, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Richland, Peerless, West Fork and Four Buttes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
